meanings.definition: To express in terms of parameters.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys parametrizing complex equations for her math homework.
meanings.sent2: The scientist is parametrizing the data to make it easier to analyze.
meanings.sent3: The chef was parametrizing the recipe, turning it into a mathematical equation for fun.
meanings.sent4: The artist was parametrizing the colors, assigning each one a unique value.
meanings.sent5: By parametrizing the problem, he was able to break it down into manageable parts.

meanings.definition: To determine or fix the parameters of.
meanings.sent1: They are parametrizing the settings to optimize the performance of the machine.
meanings.sent2: The engineer is parametrizing the system to ensure its stability.
meanings.sent3: The students were parametrizing the rules of the game, making it more challenging.
meanings.sent4: She felt like she was parametrizing her life, setting strict boundaries for herself.
meanings.sent5: By parametrizing the variables, he was able to control the outcome of the experiment.
